reviewText: I have to say I didn’t like this. The animation quality is quite good, they didn’t skimp there but the basic premise I didn’t like. The idea is that school boys, the ‘hero’ in particular rapes girls and then puts their pics on line.For me there are two problems, one is a plot line. The hero is terribly nervous that some girl will go to the police. He sort of loses this fear as it goes on but it’s never explained why the police aren’t brought in. I know there is a cultural element in Japan that would rather not have this come out but all it would take is one girl to open the flood gates and after one victim is found by another girl, it becomes hard to believe nothing was done.Two this is in fact ‘rape.’ Not a seduction or leading girls into fantasies or mind control rays or exploring a submissive side but a brutal taking and it just isn’t my style. Sure there was an ex-girl friend who wanted sex and things develop later but early on, it isn’t sexy or cool or anything but ugly and I had a hard time getting over the brutality. I started wanting the hero to be badly hurt.In the end I just found these elements to be too extreme for me to enjoy this in any way.
summary: Mishandled plot devices made this unpleasant
Title: Dark

reviewText: Two guys get off cajoling women, other schoolgirls and teachers, to have sex with them and then posting photos on their own private website.  The ladies maintain their discretion - out of fear of the images being made public.  Some of the females secretly enjoy the encounters which is probably a really bad stereotype.  All are drawn very dramatically with cute lingerie and otherwise squeaky clean.In the second episode, they get another schoolgirl to participate along with them, and there's a brief girl-girl interlude before the guys get back on track.One of the last teachers they encounter, and the hottest turns the tables by admitting that she really enjoys S&M; sex, which unfortunately is a big turn off for the dudes, go figure.The hero of the story eventually straightens himself out after his buddy goes mad.  But one of his babe victims promises to turn him back to the dark side to keep open the possibility of a sequel.It was nice, for once to watch an anime with all original footage and a decent storyline, at that.  There's some real tension building towards the end.  The video consists of two thirty minute episodes.  Ninety percent of the encounters are two-on-one.  The endings aren't overly dramatic, but sometimes given while kissing.As extras, there's a mildly BDSM slide show, multiple chapter breaks, and the option to watch the movie in Japanese with English subtitles.  Enjoy.
Title: Dark

reviewText: I have purchased 8 or 9 times, and will not buy another. They are flat and the anime looks dead.

reviewText: The anti-hero is one sick puppy and you can tell by his maniacial  gaze and crude actions although he is partially matchedby one of the female characters.  Story moves briskly along and the protagonst is finally saved at the end from the fell examples of the others.  Passable art work and brisk story line.
Title: Dark

reviewText: Out of the dozens of "hentai" titles I've watched over the last few months, this one was probably the worst. In fact, it annoyed me so much that I'm actually taking the time to write a review so that others don't make the same mistake I did by buying it.I never really cared much for detailed storylines in a porno, and this is pretty much why. It's a porno, not Forrest Gump. I just want what I came here for, and this title could barely even deliver that. The sex scenes were scarce, and what little there was, was mediocre. This was one of those very annoying pornos where the sex scenes show almost exclusively the guy the whole time, and all of the stupid faces he is making. Want to see naked women? You won't find it in this title. If you came here looking for close-up shots of guys' private parts and them making stupid faces, then this title might be for you. The "storyline" was nothing to behold, and it shouldn't be anyway. They were trying too hard, and failed.This was quite possibly the worst hentai I've ever seen. I would not recommend this title to anyone.
Title: Dark
